mapper.select: SELECT * from ( (SELECT IFNULL(count(*), 0) as codes from code) as codes, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t.id), 0) as critical from code_result_item t join code_result t1 on t.result_id = t1.id where LOWER(t.severity) = 'critical') as critical, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t.id), 0) as high from code_result_item t join code_result t1 on t.result_id = t1.id where LOWER(t.severity) = 'high') as high, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t.id), 0) as medium from code_result_item t join code_result t1 on t.result_id = t1.id where LOWER(t.severity) = 'medium') as medium, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t.id), 0) as low from code_result_item t join code_result t1 on t.result_id = t1.id where LOWER(t.severity) = 'low') as low, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t.id), 0) as unknown from code_result_item t join code_result t1 on t.result_id = t1.id where LOWER(t.severity) = 'unknown') as unknown )
SELECT concat(t.name, ' (', t.return_sum, ')') as 'name', t.return_sum as 'value' FROM code_result as t ORDER BY t.update_time DESC Limit 10;

SELECT t.name as 'product', (SELECT IFNULL(count(t1.id), 0) as Critical from code_result_item t1 where t1.result_id = t.id and LOWER(t1.severity) = 'critical') as Critical, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t1.id), 0) as High from code_result_item t1 where t1.result_id = t.id and LOWER(t1.severity) = 'high') as High, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t1.id), 0) as Medium from code_result_item t1 where t1.result_id = t.id and LOWER(t1.severity) = 'medium') as Medium, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t1.id), 0) as Low from code_result_item t1 where t1.result_id = t.id and LOWER(t1.severity) = 'low') as Low, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t1.id), 0) as Unknown from code_result_item t1 where t1.result_id = t.id and LOWER(t1.severity) = 'unknown') as Unknown FROM code_result as t ORDER BY t.update_time DESC Limit 10;
